title: I Hate My Stepbrother
description: I hate him. He's a dick. Always trying to rile me up, and I always fall for it. He's rude, arrogant, and he's probably slept with every girl at my school.But he's so fucking hot. I can't deny that. He's built, he's always bringing girls home, and he can even be kinda charming given the chance.And I think he wants to fuck me. Which is the last thing I want. But I need to do something about our relationship. Maybe if I just go see him, share a joint maybe...Hot, steamy, and oh so taboo. A 17,000+ word novella.
author: Emily Whittaker
